posts.post_content:
"Someone asked me ... if my club was for sale. What a ridiculous question. Of course it is for sale. So is my hat and my overcoat, and my watch. Anyone who wants them can have them at a price."
H. Harrison Frazee, owner Boston Red Sox, 1917.

-----------------------------

T206 Sale:  510/524 near set.

Missing:

Big Four.
Dahlen, Demmitt, Elberfeld, O'Hara team variations.
HOF:  Young (portrait).
SL:  Breitenstein, Ellam, Shaughnessy.
Common:  Chase (blue portrait), Durham.


Condition:

HOF/SL:  p/f/g
Commons: g/vg, less than 10 with any back problems.

Price:  $27,000

------------------------------

I have nothing scanned, but if there is an interest, contact me at:  [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url] and we can go from there.


Thanks for L@@King :rolleyes: --- Scott
